mapper.insert: INSERT INTO XIP_USERS( EMAIL, PW, LAST_NM, FIRST_NM, COUNTRY, TERMS_OF_USE, PRIVAC, CREAT_DT, MODIFY_DT ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{pw}, #{lastNm}, #{firstNm}, #{country}, #{termsofuse}, #{privacy}, NOW(), NOW() )
INSERT INTO EMAIL_AUTH_CODE( EMAIL, CODE, CREAT_DT, MODIFY_DT ) VALUES ( REPLACE(#{email},' ',''), #{authCd}, NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CODE = #{authCd}, MODIFY_DT = NOW();
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(EMAIL) FROM EMAIL_AUTH_CODE WHERE EMAIL = REPLACE(#{email},' ','') AND CODE = #{authCd}
SELECT COUNT(EMAIL) FROM EMAIL_AUTH_CODE WHERE EMAIL = REPLACE(#{email},' ','') AND CODE = #{authCd} AND DATE_ADD(MODIFY_DT, INTERVAL 3 MINUTE) > NOW()

SELECT M.USER_CD, M.EMAIL, D.WEB_AUTH_ID, D.CHALLENGE, D.PK, D.AAGUID, D.PK_ALGO , CASE WHEN IFNULL(X.ROLE_TYPE,'') = '' THEN 'U' ELSE X.ROLE_TYPE END AS ROLE_TYPE FROM XIP_USERS AS M LEFT OUTER JOIN WEB_AUTHN AS D ON M.USER_CD = D.USER_CD LEFT JOIN XIP_INCU AS X ON X.USER_CD = M.USER_CD AND X.EMAIL = M.EMAIL WHERE M.EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE WEB_AUTHN SET WEB_AUTH_ID = #{webAuthId}, PK = #{pk}, PK_ALGO = #{pkAlgo}, AAGUID = #{aaguid}, MODIFY_DT = NOW() WHERE USER_CD = CAST(#{userCd}AS UNSIGNED)

INSERT INTO WEB_AUTHN( USER_CD, WEB_AUTH_ID, CHALLENGE, PK, PK_ALGO, AAGUID, CREAT_DT, MODIFY_DT ) VALUES( CAST(#{userCd}AS UNSIGNED), NULL, #{challenge}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE WEB_AUTH_ID = NULL, CHALLENGE = #{challenge}, PK = NULL, PK_ALGO = NULL, AAGUID = NULL, MODIFY_DT = NOW();
mapper.select: SELECT M.EMAIL, D.WEB_AUTH_ID, M.USER_CD FROM XIP_USERS AS M LEFT OUTER JOIN WEB_AUTHN AS D ON M.USER_CD = D.USER_CD WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE XIP_USERS SET PW = #{pw}, MODIFY_DT = NOW() WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
